enter for b: -00000000000000000000000000000000001

enter for e: 1234567891011121314151617181920212223

enter for g: 00012345678910999999999999999999998
a = 12345678910999999999999999999999
b = -1
c = -12388973634783434737647326272736423
d = 1
e = 1234567891011121314151617181920212223
f = 1234567891011121314151617181920212222
g = 12345678910999999999999999999998
 x = 1234567891011121314151617181920212222+1 = 1234567891011121314151617181920212223
y =1234567891011121314151617181920212223 - -1 = 1234567891011121314151617181920212224
x == y = 0
x != y = 1
12345678910999999999999999999999 < 12345678910999999999999999999998 = 0
1234567891011121314151617181920212222 <= 1234567891011121314151617181920212223 = 1
1 > -1 = 1
1 >= -12388973634783434737647326272736423 = 1
